name: Spamfibian
description:
Submission for the Mystery Box gamejam 2020!

Control Spamfibian, the somewhat demented intergalactic delivery frog with a penchant for heavy electro. Blending the classic gameplay of Lander with a light dose of Elite profiteering, the objective is to ultimately get 100 barrels to Flustor's flagship. Whether you do them laboriously one by one, or divert to other jobs to make enough cash to upgrade your capacity, is down to you!

Controls:

Arrow Keys / WASD to turn and thrust the ship

V - Drop

B - Grab

N - Load Cargo

Also, at certain platforms you can spend cash on (U)pgrade, (F)uel and (R)epair.

Lots and lots and lots that is probably not balanced and/or flakey, so many things that didn't make the cut; but really pleased with how it came together. A lot more narrative stuff than most of my jam efforts.

Alternate platforms to follow!
